name: jsontreejs
description: a lightweight dependency free javascript micro-library

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/jsonTree.js --compress unused=false --mangle --output dist/js/jsonTree.min.js && uglifycss src/jsonTree.css > dist/css/jsonTree.min.css

author: Max Leiter <mleiter18@priorypanther.com> (http://maxleiter.github.io/)
